Detailed Description

The delegate to be connected to for a remote adapter to request RemoteWidget.

Users should extend the RemoteWidgetDelegate to provide the appropriate RemoteWidgetFactory's used to populate the remote collection widget (ListWidget, GridWidget, etc).
